comment: Intro to Market Research S3 Business d this starter ! We had to find a name for each box without using the same name twice or our own name . Nobody liked Hawaiian so we were able to start a discussion on the importance of gathering MR from that ! <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Intro to Market Research S3 Business d this starter ! We had to find a name for each box without using the same name twice or our own name . Nobody liked Hawaiian so we were able to start a discussion on the importance of gathering MR from that ! <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (b / be-destined-for-91
            :ARG2 (c / company
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Market"
                        :op2 "Research"
                        :op3 "S3"
                        :op4 "Business")))
      :snt2 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG1 (w / we)
            :ARG2 (f / find-01
                  :ARG0 w
                  :ARG1 (t / thing
                        :ARG2-of (n2 / name-01
                              :ARG1 (b2 / box
                                    :mod (e / each))))
                  :manner (u / use-01
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (o2 / or
                              :op1 (t2 / thing
                                    :ARG2-of (n3 / name-01
                                          :ARG1 w)
                                    :ARG1-of (s / same-01))
                              :op2 (t3 / thing
                                    :ARG2-of (n4 / name-01
                                          :ARG1 w))))))
      :snt3 (c2 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (d / dislike-01
                  :ARG0 (n5 / nobody)
                  :ARG1 (l / language
                        :name (n6 / name
                              :op1 "Hawaii")))
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / start-01
                        :ARG0 w
                        :ARG1 (d2 / discuss-01
                              :ARG0 w
                              :ARG1 (ii / important-01
                                    :ARG1 (g / gather-01
                                          :ARG1 (t4 / thing
                                                :name (n7 / name
                                                      :op1 "MR"))
                                          :ARG2 l)))))))
